post.body: You're the only person I know who can make insomnia sound poetic. Lol. Sorry you were having probs.
Um, that'd be an "aw HELL naw!!!"
Yeah, it's pretty hard when you wanna do right but can't. That just sucks.
I'm not surprised. The South isn't quite as progressive in stuff like that as other areas.
Swwweeeet!!!
IDK. You'd have to check with your util company to see what they offer.
OMFG! How the hell do you "forget" your employees??? Cheap bastards.
POML???
IDK My Ass! Lol.
D said "IDKMA!!". Lemme know if I need to translate the MA 4 ya
LMAO!!! D says we're twisted. Whatever could she be speaking of???
Lol. That's not from the movie! Focus.
*I am...ME :-D
No, tell G I wasn't quite freaky enough for Queen Soopers.
LMAO!! OK!! Me & my cancer victim hair will walk to the store for olives. (Might as well sport the 'do 4 a long distance)
Lol. Yeah, I'm leaning that way. A junkie has no shame, you know. Life is not the same without olives...
I'll still be self-concious cuz *I know what my head looks like. Guess we'll see what wins - vanity or olives. Lol.
That sounds really cool! Santa must have been good to you.
LOL. OK, but you better hurry.
Come on over. I'm cooking that exact menu today!
"O" really? Do tell!
Did you almost spell it P-O-O-H? :-D
A rumbly in your tumbly? Oh noooo... Lol
I'm jealy too!!
Aw damn! That sucks.
Plans today: Get my expensive as hell glasses adjusted, yet again! I am too through! Ugh.
We made another REi run. I got...you guessed it!! A new water bottle. Yay! Lol. It's actually pretty cool & I gave up an old(er) one.
I'm incredibly amused. I forget kids haven't learned the concept of tenses yet at 6. My baby girl just told me she was boring. ROTFLMAO
On a quite long con call for work with a locquacious host. My eyes are starting to glaze over. Help!!
Further evidence I'm whiter than my gf - I suggested we go to the country bar 2moro night. She said she doesn't know how to 2-step...(I do)
LilD61 has set her GPS to moo every time it's near a gas station. It's funny as hell.
I'm making snowman sugar cookies. D made fun of me cuz they all face the same direction on the cookie sheet.
Calling the energy company to find out why the *@!$ my electricity is not wind generated, like I requested.
Spiked out my hair, threw on shorts & a winter coat, snowflake socks, & shoes with mis-matched laces and went to the store. I fit right in!
Conundrum - I gave myself a haircut (bad idea) so I don't want to go out in public BUT I'm out of olives. What to do?!
I have six months to go from waaay out of shape to fit enough to ride in the one ride that's consistently kicked my ass, unlike any other.
Saw a sign for a business today that said "Barbershop & Bail Bonds". What an odd combo. "Wanna look good in jail? Call us!" Lol.
We're gonna be blowing in the New Year. I'm making tomato basil with white bean soup today & black eyed peas tomorrow. Lol.
Just saw the movie Doubt. It was pretty good. It left me with doubts. Lol.
Some guy drove by our house and took a picture. Gave me & D the heeby jeebies! WHY would someone want a pic of our house?!? Creepy.
